H0.text: Which composer's operas are famously staged in the town of Bayreuth (say "Bye-royt")?". Mozart

H1.text: Which composer's operas are famously staged in the town of Bayreuth (say "Bye-royt")?". Verdi

H2.text: Which composer's operas are famously staged in the town of Bayreuth (say "Bye-royt")?". Puccini

H3.text: Which composer's operas are famously staged in the town of Bayreuth (say "Bye-royt")?". Wagner
